Reviews.Title: Yes..... But
Reviews.Author: Samadhi1138 "DCC"
Reviews.Content: I couldn't agree more with the other reviews regarding the deceptiveness of some outfits - in this case Tiger - in selling refurbished items as new.  I felt that it was important, however, to review the product and not the vendor.  I've used the D610 professionally with great success for several years.  I was so pleased with its performance that I bought one for my personal use as well as two more for my in-laws.  I bought all three as refurbs but I knew what I was getting and the price was unbeatable at approximately $250.00 each.  If you're a wannabe geek such as I am, you can easily find all of the service literature necessary to service the D610 yourself.  I've never had to service any of the three that I bought, but I did expand the memory in all of them.  I was pleased with how easy the upgrade was, how well engineered the product is, and how clear the service literature is as well.  I bought a hard drive caddy and an additional 80GB HD to fit in the CD port, so now I have 2 bootable HDs and a ton of storage.  If forced to search for a negative, the only thing I can come up with is the click action of the pointing device.  The feel is a bit stiff and the sound is somewhat irritating.  That said, if the pointing device ever became bothersome enough a USB mouse could be purchased for a couple of bucks.  I was looking for another D610 to buy for my wife when I stumbled upon these reviews so I felt compelled to put in my two cents worth.  Good luck with whatever product you choose!

Reviews.Title: Beware:  Invalid License
Reviews.Author: R
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these laptops two months ago. It has been working just fine. Today Microsoft told me that the license is not valid. It has a valid certificate of authenticity on the back but does not have a second "refurbished" CoA. When I look at the internal System Properties/General tab it says "XP Corporate" which means it was covered under a mass/site license which can not be transferred or sold. I will probably have to buy a fresh copy of XP ($100) and re-install.Before I made the order I checked to see that the advertisement specified "Genuine Windows XP". I also checked the CoA when it arrived. When the Microsoft updater offered to run "Genuine Advantage" to check the authenticity I confidently thought "sure, go right ahead."BEWARE!

Reviews.Title: I lucked out?
Reviews.Author: Brun Hilda "Brun Hilda"
Reviews.Content: This older laptop arrived with a replaced E key, and a small spot of fingernail polish barely noticeable..  Other than those minor flaws, this laptop was more than I expected.  More hard drive space than advertised, more ports than I thought would fit on a laptop and it even has a burner, not just a player and it works perfectly.  The first time I turned it on,it immediately found my wi-fi and it's been a joy to work with since.  It's made my Inspiron 1501 look like a piece of junk.I bought from perfectbuy_perfectsell who responded to my email immediately and offered a 14 day return policy.

Reviews.Title: Saved my marriage
Reviews.Author: Sandy Bunker
Reviews.Content: My wife's computer is upstairs; mine is in the man cave. For Christmas I had got this laptop so she could surf in the man cave while I watched TV or was on my computer. She fell and broke her ankle Dec. 17 and could not climb the stairs. Got her present early. Keeps her quiet while I try to do all the other things to care for her. The value and quaily are completely as advertised. She could not be happier and if she is happy, I am happy. WIFI forever.

Reviews.Title: RIPOFF; Refurbished, NOT NEW as advertised
Reviews.Author: Bill Gross "Big Bill in LA"
Reviews.Content: Was careful to shop for brand new. Purchased this for a client. Although the refurb is factory, that is NOT what I purchased. Tiger Direct via Amazon, would not use again.

Reviews.Title: Dell Laptop from Tampa Laptops
Reviews.Author: Alan E. Donaldson "Avid Writer"
Reviews.Content: I can hardly say enough good about my purchase of a used Dell Latitude D610 laptop from Tampa Laptops through Amazon.com. The machine arrived two days after I placed the order, it was exactly as advertised, worked perfectly and was priced right. I wanted to introduce my wife to the digital world, both of us being advanced in years, and to have a machine to teach her on that operated just like my desktop with XP. This laptop is perfect for that purpose and the transaction was completely painless. Thanks to Amazon for the Tampa Laptop contact and the security of purchase that Aamzon provides.[ASIN:B002TOKT74 Dell Latitude D610-1.73 Laptop Wireless Computer (Refurbished)]]

Reviews.Title: 4 hours setting up
Reviews.Author: Dawna
Reviews.Content: The laptop itself is working great.  I received it the day after ordering it, which was wonderful, since it was a birthday present for my 13 yr old.  However, when the details said it was ready to go, they obviously didn't mean for wireless internet use.  I spent almost 3 hours on the phone with an AT&T; representative, had to go to the store for a cable to hook it up to my router, then have another representative spend 45 minutes, using the computer remotely, to trouble shoot and finally get it to go online. If it wasn't for the very speedy delivery of the product, I think I would've been much more upset.  But, all in all, at the end of the day, everyone was happy.  It was well worth the money and time to get it going.

Reviews.Title: laptop
Reviews.Author: peanut gang
Reviews.Content: This computer is very handy, and it does so far everything it was promised to do.  It is in very good condition and it works like a charm thus far.  An excellent purchase for the price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Deal, As Advertised
Reviews.Author: Jmhford
Reviews.Content: After reading other reviews, I'm afraid to allow the Windows Advantage Update go through, I'd rather not be accused of Software Piracy.  However, the laptop arrive quickly, in pristine condition, and worked right out of the package.  I already have a powerful desktop, but always wanted a travel computer simply for the internet and mainly for fantasy sports drafts.  This is going to be perfect, and for a very affordable price.  It even had better specs - or at least a larger Hard Drive, than expected.

Reviews.Title: dell D610
Reviews.Author: justwaiting
Reviews.Content: This laptop is performing very well. I am impressed with it for the price. why go buy a brand new laptop when you can get a refurbished one at less than half price and it does the same job. it would be great for a student or someone who just wants one to set on the couch and check emails. I dont do alot of work on it but surfing and youtubing its great. I even bought a second so my daughter would leave mine alone.  Thanks for a great value

Reviews.Title: Laptop
Reviews.Author: patti.MT
Reviews.Content: Laptop was very hot after about 20 minutes of use, almost too hot to touch mouse pad and bottom of laptop, due to a faulty/defective battery.  I was afraid it was going to catch on fire; it got so hot laptop would shut down.  Finally, after a few days, battery just quit charging, etc.  Took the battery completely out and laptop works fine.  So, now I have a "desktop" until I purchase a new battery, which is not so good because I do Medical Transcription on the go.  Make sure if you purchase that you add into you budget for a new battery because I don't think they guarantee them, though my slip said battery was in good working condition, and they do not replace batteries.

Reviews.Title: very happy
Reviews.Author: Sylvia
Reviews.Content: This computer met all my expectations.  I have 2 children who are avid writers.  We wanted something portable so they could write "on the road" or in the car. It is working out great, and for such a great price.  Very happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: Durable Laptop
Reviews.Author: Jason Shadow "Jason"
Reviews.Content: This is a good laptop for students. A very good price also. If you want to save like $50.00, then buy this laptop. If you would rather spent an extra $50. - $100. on a brand new laptop then that's your choice. The only few problems i have with this laptop is that it gets hot within a hour of being online, and it makes a weird clicking noise once it gets too hot.

Reviews.Title: OMG!!!!
Reviews.Author: natcole gregory
Reviews.Content: Oh my gosh, i love this computer. it works great. i can do all the things i wanted and need to do with it. It's sleek and compact enough that i can carry it with me.i would HIGHLY recommend this company and their products. thank you guys so much!!!

Reviews.Title: Only one thing I dislike.
Reviews.Author: Ashley Hunnicutt
Reviews.Content: I purchased this laptop as a replacement for the Toshiba I had, which crashed. I was expecting it to be slow and not have many features as I downgraded (or upgraded since I HATED vista anyway) to XP PRO. On the contrary, it is great!! The only thing about it that I do NOT like about it? I HATE the trackpad. I hate it... it drags and is difficult to maneuver so I have to purchase a USB mouse.

Reviews.Title: worth the price
Reviews.Author: Travis
Reviews.Content: Received promptly. Upgrades were as stated, however there are two vexing problems.(1)Battery life is only about 45 minutes, and(2)the screen doesn't adjust to varying light conditions. Could be operator error.All in all though I am reasonably pleased with my purchase.P.S.Read the manual, found the Fn key, screen works fine now.So other than the low batt life,everything is fine.

Reviews.Title: Scam Artist
Reviews.Author: Dannisayles
Reviews.Content: I ordered this computer from this seller as a Christmas present for my 13 year old. The first one shipped to me had over 160 updates that needed to be installed and the CPU usage shot through the roof when I downloaded anti-virus software. I contacted the seller who claimed to sell 300 of these this year and said I was the only one with an issue. Giving him the benefit of the doubt, I asked him to replace the computer. He even agreed to add an extra GIG of space. It took him 3+ weeks to send the replacement. On 2/7 he sent the replacement and told me to let him know when I receive it. As soon as the computer came, I immediately tried to download antivirus software and I had the same issue. I emailed the seller regarding the issue and did not get a response for several days. I went to file a claim through Amazon and low and behold, I wasn't able to do it on my own since it had passed the deadline. I am thankful that a crook like him will not get away with this and I am done giving people the benefit of the doubt. Here it is February and my daughter has YET to even use the gift she got for Christmas. Buyer beware of this seller!!

Reviews.Title: Pleased in Texas
Reviews.Author: Mike in Texas
Reviews.Content: I received this item promptly after placing my order and it was received in excellent shape. It was packaged very well to eliminate damage during shipping. Product was purchased used but could not tell by looking at it. It came ready to use, turned it on right out of the box, started up quickly, and ran smoothly, really fast. Put a DVD in and movie started very quickly. I went to full screen and picture was great and the sound was too. I am very happy with my purchase and will purchase all future computer requirements from Tampa-Laptops. Also, great price. Best bang for your buck!Mike in Texas

Reviews.Title: dont buy a thing from here
Reviews.Author: Richard Ludwig "Richard F Ludwig"
Reviews.Content: if your looking for a good working laptop go to your nearest thrift store pick out the worst looking one you see and buy it because it will be a lot better than the products sold buy tampa laptops i bought a laptop for a underprivledged 12 year old girl not only they sent me the wrong laptop but the sent a &30.00 cheaper one that only works withthe unit plugged in this was done for angel tree and this company has beat me around the bush over and over again about a lousy $172.00 laptop for a needey child  beside it not working unplugged in there were 8 very visabvle spots all over the screeen and when the one i orignaly ordered they didnt have the decency to call me or contact me to see if i wanted a refund or upgrade so if your looking to waste your money on a trash broken laptop go to tampa laptops there the best at selling junk and keeping your moneyRichard Ludwig 321-543-5395 oh the broken laptop cost me more than the one i ordered so i guesss they have money for lunch now

Reviews.Title: Not a good buy
Reviews.Author: Donna Dickens
Reviews.Content: For the price, I got what I paid for.  It doesn't have a wireless connecting, had to put in a chip to make it work, show functioning.

Reviews.Title: Phillylocks
Reviews.Author: Phillylocks
Reviews.Content: I love the Dell 610 computer, it is compact and easy to use. But mainly, I appreciate the excellent service I received in ordering this product.

Reviews.Title: GOOOD!
Reviews.Author: George from Georgia
Reviews.Content: It works great has no visible defect and i like it so much. its awesome for this prise !!!Excellent condition i am happy with this product thank you.

Reviews.Title: Dell Dinosaur
Reviews.Author: QicVic
Reviews.Content: I recieved my Dell Latitude computer and thought it would be nicer.  It actually is a dinosaur; very slow and reaction is lathargic.  I wish I could have seen one prior to ordering.  While it does work well, it is just not a quick responder.

Reviews.Title: OKAY
Reviews.Author: BenMackay
Reviews.Content: Product was much like it was described but I discovered it's much slower than I envisaged for the 1GHz processor. seems the motherboard was much more worn than I thought.

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude D610 Notebook PC
Reviews.Author: Korrina
Reviews.Content: I'm happy to have my own computer/laptop now. It was a good deal. But it only has 510 MB on it. Which isn't very much memory. And it didn't come with the humming bird screen pic. Like it showed online.

Reviews.Title: Dude, you're getting a Dell
Reviews.Author: vjgem
Reviews.Content: Great price, quick delivery.  I purchased this for my son who is a college student.  I will definitely purchase more electronics through Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Good deal for the price.
Reviews.Author: Potato
Reviews.Content: The unit arrived when promised and is fully functional as advertised with only two minor smudges in the high wear area of the track-pad and the left track-pad button. The battery appears to be in very good condition as I get several hours of operation on a charge. The only thing lacking is an SD Card slot. Not really any problem. I am 100% satisfied.

Reviews.Title: I love this computer !
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: This computer is the bomb it works really nice with the WiFi and was everything and more that was listed on the description.

Reviews.Title: Great little old lap top!
Reviews.Author: PJD "smart shopper 30144"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this in Oct. 2010 from perfectbuy_perfect sell. Fabulous seller. The unit has a larger hard drive and more memory than the one showing here. It had a clean install of Windows XP Professional including all updates and service packs. The seller was responsive to my concerns about a valid Windows product etc. So far no problems at all getting updates from Microsoft and no validation error messages.I am having a bit of a problem getting used to the smaller key board as compared to my honking 17.9" Toshiba lap top that is my primary PC. This was purchased as a back up for use in my bedroom on a wireless network. It has performed flawlessly. No problem getting network connected and I love the fact it has 4 USB ports instead of the 2 my Toshiba has.I highly recommend the model and the seller. It was a great buying experience all the way around !

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude D610 Refurbished PC
Reviews.Author: Richard Hansen
Reviews.Content: The computer runs great.  I'm very happy with the purchase.  It took a little longer to arrive than expected, but not a big deal.

Reviews.Title: Everything I Needed
Reviews.Author: Michael J
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little laptop and makes a good backup for my main PC.  The wi-fi works great and it found my wireless router with no problem.  I'm glad I purchased it and the seller was good to deal with.

Reviews.Title: Not so great
Reviews.Author: Chrea Jones
Reviews.Content: Crashed 2 months after having it and spent too much time and money trying to fix it .....oh well, it is what it is.

Reviews.Title: Well.......
Reviews.Author: Joseph Pendleton
Reviews.Content: Im sure this was a good laptop for its time but these days this won't really cut it. Its a single processor and very very slow even with light internet browsing and the one I got had a virus or patch bug particular to Windows XP, something about the windows update software, tried to solve it but it didn't work so well. Fortunately the Amazon seller was very knowledgeable about the issue and offered to replace it with a better laptop for the same price. Awesome customer service, ended up with a Dell Lattitude D520 WAYYYYYYYY better laptop than this one and I got two of now and they work great.

Reviews.Title: Computer worked great for 2 weeks.
Reviews.Author: Jenn E
Reviews.Content: Bought this laptop for my son as a game playing computer as he doesn't web surf at all. After owning 2 weeks the windows said unauthentic.Beware buying from TAMPA LAPTOPS.After bringing it to a local computer store I was told how to watch for his scam. The windows sticker on the bottom was ripped in half removing the certification code. They wanted another $80 to give me a code to re-certify my windows.Scammers TAMPA LAPTOPS ON EBAY Scammers

Reviews.Title: Glad I went bought from Tampa Computers
Reviews.Author: gina k bagne
Reviews.Content: For an older lap top model this one was fairly light, fast, and a comfortable size for your lap. When you order something used there is always a risk, the battery wouldn't charge when I recieved this one. Tampa computers was prompt in replying. They contacted me the same day, had me try a couple of quick fixes, and when that didn't work took the return without a fuss. They returned the computer to me in perfect working order in less than 10 working days. I would recomend Tampa without hesitation, and the D610 is a nice basic machine too.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: PMC
Reviews.Content: i AM VERY HAPPY WITH THE LAPTOP. JUST WHAT I HOPED FOR - NO COMPLAINTS.ONLY PROBLEM WAS THE TOUCH PAD. I COULD NOT ADJUST THE TAP SENSITIVITY, BUT DOWNLOADED PROGRAM AND ALL IS GOOD...

Reviews.Title: Don't buy from this seller.  Very dissatisfied.
Reviews.Author: PoeticInspiration
Reviews.Content: This was a rip off.  I purchased this product and it was used and I thought it was going to be new.  It was dingy and the one thing I hated about it most was the fact that the battery was no good.  I think the battery should have been checked before it was sent out.  I never got this notebook to work.  This was a waste of my time and my money.  I will never purchase from this seller again and would highly recommend that no one else purchase from this seller.  I have bought quite a few things from Amazon and this was the worst purchase to date.  Matter of fact, everything else I have purchased has been new or very much like new.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: W. Torborg "Straight up"
Reviews.Content: But not much RAM memory.  Because of the RAM memory it gets slow after a while.  You won't get a hard copy of windows so if you need to reformat, you had better buy something else.

Reviews.Title: Dell laptop
Reviews.Author: Joseph Brooks
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant to get this laptop, since it is rather outdated.  I find that it fitts all my requirements for a portable computer.

Reviews.Title: You need a new picture because this one is deceiving!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Hate is a strong word, but it was nothing like I expected. Wi fi is good if you can get on line nothing we tried helped.

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude D610 Notebook PC
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Noland
Reviews.Content: The Processing speed is kinda Slow and it heats up rather quickly when used for a long eriod of time but it works and has wireless so I can use it thank you.

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude D610 Notebook PC
Reviews.Author: Satisfied Customer
Reviews.Content: This unit was advertised with a restore disk included.  This unit arrived without a restore disk, I had to ask that a restore disk be sent to me,I soon discovered that the VGA output was inoperate.When I called Cravinsavings a male answered the phone. He tried to make the inoperate VGA output my fault, and promptly hung up the phone.A few minutes after the male at Cravinsavings hug up the phone, a lady at Cravinsavings called back.  She exchanged my, Laptop. I received another Laptop in two (2)days.Everything, so far is going "Good" with this exchanged computer.

Reviews.Title: It's A Work Horse!
Reviews.Author: Marcello
Reviews.Content: I loved this computer until it was unfortunately stolen by some nefarious roommates. I have nothing but glowing things to say about it. It did tend to get hot after hours of use, but I never had an incident and I threw ALOT at this device. It's a worthy buy, although I'm not sure it's hardware is up to par for running most of today's OSs & applications.

Reviews.Title: Satisfaction  survey
Reviews.Author: frederickBromley
Reviews.Content: It is exactly what I wanted. The XP OS is like an old friend- comfortable and easy for me to use

Reviews.Title: Faulty computer Rotten return policy
Reviews.Author: paula davenport
Reviews.Content: Bougt this for my grandson and had it shipped to heim in Auburn,Wa. Item was defective (ethernet port deformed resulting in loose fit of ethernet cable which would not maintain contact rendering it useless) The vender would not allow them to return it saying that only I could return the item which meant that my daughter woulfd have to ship it to me and I would have to ship it to the vender for repair, and then ship it back to my daughter once i received it back from vender, and I would have to pay for all shipping. I don,t understand why the person they shipped it to could not return it, and furthermore why do I have to pay shipping charges to return a defective item.If this problem is not resolved i will never deal with this or any other vendor through Amazon.comVery shoddy business practices.Let the buyer beware

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude Notebook PC
Reviews.Author: Deanna J Wise
Reviews.Content: This was a gift, my daughter seems to be very pleased with it.  She has not complained at all. Decent notepad.

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude D610 Notebook PC (Intel Pentium M 1.86GHZ, Windows XP)
Reviews.Author: MARIA
Reviews.Content: I give this item a four star rating taking into account the prompt attention to any inquiry you have to the vendor, Jeremy's Laptops; the customer service is excellent.Considering that the Dell Latitude D610 notebook I bought was a refurbished one, unfortunately its battery needs to be replaced since it lasts only about 45 minutes. The value of the Dell Latitude D610 notebook was slightly higher than other offers but it has been working all right so far except that it tends to reheat a lot (I am using some sort of stand to let the hot air dissipate from it).  Overall and taking into account the courteus customer service, I think it deserves a four star.

Reviews.Title: using it now
Reviews.Author: JEANNE HARTMAN
Reviews.Content: perfect for travel, light and compact.  i do a lot of house and pet sitting .. take it with me and enjoy the wi-fi i don't get at home.

Reviews.Title: Damaged product
Reviews.Author: JESUS J. AGUIRRE
Reviews.Content: The ethernet port and two usb ports on the right side, don't work. Is there any way I can file a claim?

Reviews.Title: do not buy
Reviews.Author: lorenzo
Reviews.Content: very bad item does not work well at all  bought this for my daughter she was very upset with me over this item
